name: Save The Ship!!
description:
Originally made for the DevAtlas-Jam2

Theme: OneLightSource

The ship is going down! Computer viruses have been able to make portals to get into the real world. They have destroyed the battery that controls the lights on the ship soon they will destroy the thrusters. You are a service robot that has gotten an upgrade that put a cannon on your side. Luckily you have a battery that powers a light on your head. The battery drains pretty fast but you have the option of pressing E that charges you battery. Sadly you have to stop moving and you can’t shoot while you charge. You can press space bar to shoot. W.A.S.D is your up down left and right movement keys.  You can press H to skip the level if you can’t figure out how to solve the level. ( This is not the recommend way to play the game)

E-charge

W-up

A-left

S-down

D-right

Space bar-shoot

H-skip level
